item.title: Quickly create a test instance of KeyCloak in Azure Services
item.description: Keycloak is a leader in the landscape of Identity Provider and if you need a quick instance for dev testing, you can spin an instance in Azure App Services in less than a minute. First of all creates a new Azure App Services and choose to use Docker Figure 1: Create a docker based app service. Now you can simply choose the image you want to run, jboss/keycloak is perfectly ok for my scenario.
